collection:
It explains
when and how NinjaCat collects end user and client information, including
Personally Identifiable Information (defined below), how we use such
information, and the circumstances under which we may disclose such
information to others.

‍  

### **Visitors to the NinjaCat Website  
**

If you are a visitor to the NinjaCat website or a NinjaCat client (“Client”)
who registers or signs into the NinjaCat website (including for purposes of
obtaining a free trial of NinjaCat’ services), we may obtain the following
types of information from you or concerning your computer or device (“NinjaCat
Client Information”), which may include information that can itself be used to
identify and/or contact you (“Personally Identifiable Information”)  

  * Name
  * Email
  * Website Name and URL
  * Credit Card Number
  * Billing Address
  * Visitor Site Preferences

When you visit or log in to our website, cookies and similar technologies may
be used by our online data partners or vendors to associate these activities
with other personal information they or others have about you, including by
association with your email or home address.

NinjaCat may also receive certain information that may be provided by your
browser or mobile device, including:  
‍  

  * Browser Information  

  * Operating System Information  

  * Mobile Device Information (e.g., device identifier, mobile operating system, etc.)

* IP Address  

  * Pages Accessed  

  * Time of Visit  

  * Time of Last Visit  

  * Referring Site, Application, or Service, including the relevant Search Queries that led you to NinjaCat’ Website  

### **Visitors to NinjaCat’ Clients’ Websites  
**

Our Clients may use customized and proprietary NinjaCat’ code, software and/or
services (“Service”) to obtain information regarding the activities that users
engage in while visiting their web pages (“Client’s User Data”).

When a user
visits a website that uses NinjaCat’ Service, NinjaCat code contained on the
website contacts NinjaCat’ servers and enables NinjaCat to collect Client’s
User Data.

Some Clients may also use their own code to obtain Client’s User
Data and then send such information to NinjaCat’ servers.

Client’s User Data is stored on NinjaCat’ web servers and databases for use in
performing analysis and producing reports for the NinjaCat Client only.

In addition, NinjaCat may collect certain information about a Client’s
Visitor’s computer that may be provided by the Visitor’s browser.

This
includes browser information, operating system information, mobile device
information, IP address, time of visit, and the referring site, application,
or service.

Such information is collected even though not determined not
determined by the Client.

Because Clients have the sole discretion to determine what Information
NinjaCat collects about or from the Clients’ users, this Privacy Policy does
not apply to any Client’s User Data, including Personally Identifiable
Information, that NinjaCat may collect, obtain, or access in connection with
operating the NinjaCat Service.

**

### **Visitors to NinjaCat’ Clients’ Websites  
**

We use the NinjaCat Client Information, including Personally Identifiable
Information, to register your account, fulfill your requests, understand how
you are engaging with NinjaCat, communicate with you, determine if you are
satisfied with the Service, process billing for NinjaCat Services, and
personalize your experience on the NinjaCat website and with the NinjaCat
Service.

NinjaCat also contractually requires its Clients to obtain any necessary
consents from visitors to its website(s) for the Client’s use of NinjaCat’
services, and to post an online privacy policy that provides each visitor with
clear notice of its practices regarding data collection, use, and disclosure
(including the Client’s use of NinjaCat), along with a link to the NinjaCat
Privacy Policy and to the NinjaCat Service Opt-Out.

NinjaCat has no control
over its Clients’ activities or the disclosures made by its Clients in their
privacy policies or on their websites, however, and it cannot be held
responsible for any Client’s failure to make these disclosures on its website
or for any Client’s use or collection of Client’s User Data that is not
permitted under this Privacy Policy or otherwise.

‍  

## **NinjaCat’ Use of Cookies and Web Beacons  
**

### Cookies

NinjaCat uses cookies (small text files that NinjaCat stores locally on your
computer) on our Client’s websites for one or more of the following purposes:
to help identify unique visitors and/or devices; assess usage patterns and
perform traffic analysis; identify visitor preferences; conduct A/B testing;
diagnose problems with our servers, and otherwise administer the NinjaCat
Service.

NinjaCat does not use methods such as browser cache, Flash cookies,
or eTags, for acquiring or storing information about end users web browsing
activity on Client websites or otherwise.

Depending on how our Clients use NinjaCat’ Services, information contained in
NinjaCat cookies placed on the computers of end users may be linked to
Personally Identifiable Information in NinjaCat’ database.

In addition, please be aware that even
if you configure your browser settings to reject all cookies, your activity on
NinjaCat client websites will still be recorded by our Service, unless you opt
out of our Service as set forth below.

‍  

### **Web Beacons  
**

NinjaCat may also collect certain information using Web Beacons.

You acknowledge that such transfers may occur, and that any
purchaser of or successor to NinjaCat or its assets may continue to collect,
use and disclose your information acquired prior to such transfer or
acquisition as set forth in this policy.

We do not knowingly
collect personally identifiable information from children under 13 or from
websites that are targeted to children under 13.

If we make material changes to the way we collect, use or
disclose Personally Identifying Information, we will notify you by posting a
clear and prominent announcement on NinjaCat or through a direct communication
to your NinjaCat account.
sharing:
It explains
when and how NinjaCat collects end user and client information, including
Personally Identifiable Information (defined below), how we use such
information, and the circumstances under which we may disclose such
information to others.

Please note that this Privacy Policy does not apply to the practices of
companies other than NinjaCat, or to individuals whom NinjaCat does not employ
or manage, including any of the third parties to which NinjaCat may disclose
Information as set forth in this Privacy Policy.

**

### **NinjaCat Data Usage Policy  
**

NinjaCat will not permit access to, or otherwise divulge to a third party, the
information we compile for you from any data entered into our system by you or
obtained through API connections to your Google Adwords, Google Analytics,
Webmaster Tools accounts or any other sources except for the express purpose
of generating reports which have been requested, authorized or approved by
you, or unless acting under a good faith belief that such action is necessary
to troubleshoot problems with the Services.

NinjaCat's use and transfer of information received from Google APIs to any
other app will adhere to [Google API Services User Data
Policy](https://developers.google.com/terms/api-services-user-data-policy),
including the Limited Use requirements.

‍  

### **Visitors to the NinjaCat Website  
**

If you are a visitor to the NinjaCat website or a NinjaCat client (“Client”)
who registers or signs into the NinjaCat website (including for purposes of
obtaining a free trial of NinjaCat’ services), we may obtain the following
types of information from you or concerning your computer or device (“NinjaCat
Client Information”), which may include information that can itself be used to
identify and/or contact you (“Personally Identifiable Information”)  

  * Name
  * Email
  * Website Name and URL
  * Credit Card Number
  * Billing Address
  * Visitor Site Preferences

When you visit or log in to our website, cookies and similar technologies may
be used by our online data partners or vendors to associate these activities
with other personal information they or others have about you, including by
association with your email or home address.

‍  

### **Visitors to NinjaCat’ Clients’ Websites**

Except as described in the “Disclosure of Information to Third Parties”
section below, NinjaCat never sells or shares any Client’s User Data with
individuals or companies other than the specific Client whose website
transmitted the Client’s User Data to NinjaCat.

NinjaCat also contractually requires its Clients to obtain any necessary
consents from visitors to its website(s) for the Client’s use of NinjaCat’
services, and to post an online privacy policy that provides each visitor with
clear notice of its practices regarding data collection, use, and disclosure
(including the Client’s use of NinjaCat), along with a link to the NinjaCat
Privacy Policy and to the NinjaCat Service Opt-Out.

## Disclosure of Information to third parties  

### **Service Providers  
**

Information, including NinjaCat Client Information, Client’s User Data, and
any Personally Identifiable Information contained therein, may be shared with
certain third-party companies and individuals that help facilitate technical
and administrative aspects of the NinjaCat Service (e.g., credit card
processing), or perform functions related to the administration of NinjaCat
(e.g.

These third parties perform tasks on our behalf and
are contractually obligated not to disclose or use NinjaCat User Information
or Client’s User Data for any other purpose, and to employ adequate security
measures to prevent unauthorized access to such data.

‍  

### **NinjaCat Partners  
**

If you are a NinjaCat Client that signed up through our Partners Program, your
NinjaCat Client Information may be shared with the Partner Program member that
signed you up for NinjaCat’ Service.

These Partner Program members may use
that information to help you setup, adjust, manage, and cancel your account
with NinjaCat.

‍  

### **Law Enforcement and Legal Process  
**

NinjaCat also reserves the right to disclose any NinjaCat Client Information
or Client User Information (including Personally Identifiable Information) to:
(i) comply with any law, regulation, or legal request; (ii) enforce, apply, or
investigate breaches of the Terms of Use or other agreements; (iii) respond to
client requests; or (iv) protect the rights, property, user experience, or
safety of NinjaCat, our employees, our users, or others.

‍  

### **Change of Control  
**

If NinjaCat, or substantially all of its assets, is acquired by another
company or successor entity, NinjaCat Client Information and/or Client’s User
Data will be one of the assets transferred or acquired by the purchaser or
successor.

You acknowledge that such transfers may occur, and that any
purchaser of or successor to NinjaCat or its assets may continue to collect,
use and disclose your information acquired prior to such transfer or
acquisition as set forth in this policy.

If we make material changes to the way we collect, use or
disclose Personally Identifying Information, we will notify you by posting a
clear and prominent announcement on NinjaCat or through a direct communication
to your NinjaCat account.
